name: qr_code
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool qr_code_api_v92.
Tool description: This is an API that converts a URL into a QR code image
API description: Creates a QR code by making a GET request to the QR code API with the given URL.

url.description: The URL to be included in the QR code. Defaults to 'https://rapidapi.com/'.
